PdfMerger.description: A tool that allows you to merge multiple PDF files into a single file. All processing is done in your browser, ensuring privacy and security.

about.title: About This App
about.description1: A free PDF merging tool that runs entirely in your browser.
about.description2: No server communication is required, all processing is done locally on your device.

privacy.title: Files and Privacy
privacy.description1: Uploaded PDFs are only stored in your device's memory or browser's temporary storage and are never sent externally.
privacy.description2: You can minimize traces by clearing the cache after use or using incognito mode.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description1: We make no guarantees regarding the operation or accuracy and safety of the merged results.
disclaimer.description2: Please use at your own risk. Always backup important files before trying.

damages.title: Regarding Damages
damages.description: The author is not liable for any losses or damages (including data loss and lost profits) arising from the use or inability to use this application.

updates.title: Updates and Termination
updates.description: Features may be added, modified, or discontinued without notice. Please check the GitHub repository or public page for the latest information.
